00001 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00002 ! Subroutine : MPI_UpdateG
00003 ! Revision   : 1.0 (2008-06-15)

00005 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

00032 
00033  SUBROUTINE MPI_UpdateG
00034 
00035 ! Common Variables
00036  USE Domain
00037  USE FluidParams
00038  USE LBMParams
00039  USE MPIParams
00040  USE MPI
00041  IMPLICIT NONE
00042 
00043 ! Local Variables
00044  INTEGER :: count, i, j
00045  INTEGER :: MPI_ERR, MPI_REQ
00046  INTEGER :: status(MPI_STATUS_SIZE)
00047 
00048 !--------- Save data for inward g components -----------------------------------
00049 ! X DIRECTION
00050  count = 1
00051  DO j = yl, yu
00052    g_west_snd(count)     = gbar(xlg,j,3)
00053    g_west_snd(count + 1) = gbar(xlg,j,6)
00054    g_west_snd(count + 2) = gbar(xlg,j,7)
00055 
00056    g_east_snd(count)     = gbar(xug,j,1)
00057    g_east_snd(count + 1) = gbar(xug,j,5)
00058    g_east_snd(count + 2) = gbar(xug,j,8)
00059    count = count + 3
00060  END DO
00061 
00062 ! Y DIRECTION
00063  count = 1
00064  DO i = xl, xu
00065    g_south_snd(count)     = gbar(i,ylg,4)
00066    g_south_snd(count + 1) = gbar(i,ylg,7)
00067    g_south_snd(count + 2) = gbar(i,ylg,8)
00068 
00069    g_north_snd(count)     = gbar(i,yug,2)
00070    g_north_snd(count + 1) = gbar(i,yug,5)
00071    g_north_snd(count + 2) = gbar(i,yug,6)
00072    count = count + 3
00073  END DO
00074  
00075 ! DIAGONALS
00076  g_ne_snd = gbar(xug,yug,5)
00077  g_nw_snd = gbar(xlg,yug,6)
00078  g_sw_snd = gbar(xlg,ylg,7)
00079  g_se_snd = gbar(xug,ylg,8)
00080 
00081 
00082 !--------- Exchange information using MPI calls --------------------------------
00083 ! X DIRECTION
00084  CALL MPI_IRECV(g_east_rcv, xsize3, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, east, tag2, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ, MPI_ERR)
00085  CALL MPI_SEND( g_west_snd, xsize3, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, west, tag2, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00086  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ, status, MPI_ERR)
00087 
00088  CALL MPI_IRECV(g_west_rcv, xsize3, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, west, tag4, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ, MPI_ERR)
00089  CALL MPI_SEND( g_east_snd, xsize3, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, east, tag4, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00090  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ, status, MPI_ERR)
00091 
00092 ! Y DIRECTION
00093  CALL MPI_IRECV(g_north_rcv, ysize3, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, north, tag2, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ, MPI_ERR)
00094  CALL MPI_SEND( g_south_snd, ysize3, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, south, tag2, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00095  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ, status, MPI_ERR)
00096 
00097  CALL MPI_IRECV(g_south_rcv, ysize3, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, south, tag4, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ, MPI_ERR)
00098  CALL MPI_SEND( g_north_snd, ysize3, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, north, tag4, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00099  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ, status, MPI_ERR)
00100 
00101 ! DIAGONALS
00102  CALL MPI_IRECV(g_ne_rcv, 1, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, ne, tag1, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ, MPI_ERR)
00103  CALL MPI_SEND( g_sw_snd, 1, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, sw, tag1, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00104  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ, status, MPI_ERR)
00105 
00106  CALL MPI_IRECV(g_nw_rcv, 1, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, nw, tag2, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ, MPI_ERR)
00107  CALL MPI_SEND( g_se_snd, 1, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, se, tag2, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00108  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ, status, MPI_ERR)
00109 
00110  CALL MPI_IRECV(g_se_rcv, 1, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, se, tag3, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ, MPI_ERR)
00111  CALL MPI_SEND( g_nw_snd, 1, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, nw, tag3, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00112  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ, status, MPI_ERR)
00113 
00114  CALL MPI_IRECV(g_sw_rcv, 1, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, sw, tag4, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ, MPI_ERR)
00115  CALL MPI_SEND( g_ne_snd, 1, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, ne, tag4, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00116  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ, status, MPI_ERR)
00117 
00118 
00119 !--------- Update inward components of g in the real nodes ---------------------
00120 ! X DIRECTION
00121  count = 1
00122  DO j = yl, yu
00123    gbar(xu,j,3) = g_east_rcv(count)
00124    gbar(xu,j,6) = g_east_rcv(count + 1)
00125    gbar(xu,j,7) = g_east_rcv(count + 2)
00126 
00127    gbar(xl,j,1) = g_west_rcv(count)
00128    gbar(xl,j,5) = g_west_rcv(count + 1)
00129    gbar(xl,j,8) = g_west_rcv(count + 2)
00130    count = count + 3
00131  END DO
00132 
00133 ! Y DIRECTION
00134  count = 1
00135  DO i = xl, xu
00136    gbar(i,yu,4) = g_north_rcv(count)
00137    gbar(i,yu,7) = g_north_rcv(count + 1)
00138    gbar(i,yu,8) = g_north_rcv(count + 2)
00139 
00140    gbar(i,yl,2) = g_south_rcv(count)
00141    gbar(i,yl,5) = g_south_rcv(count + 1)
00142    gbar(i,yl,6) = g_south_rcv(count + 2)
00143    count = count + 3
00144  END DO
00145 
00146 ! DIAGONALS
00147  gbar(xu,yu,7) = g_ne_rcv
00148  gbar(xl,yu,8) = g_nw_rcv
00149  gbar(xl,yl,5) = g_sw_rcv
00150  gbar(xu,yl,6) = g_se_rcv
00151 
00152  RETURN
00153  END SUBROUTINE MPI_UpdateG
00154
